name: Polarity Jet
description:
This game was created for Weekly Game Jam - Week 134

The theme: "Magnet"

Fly as far as possible in a tunnel riddled with magnets with different polarities!

Your jet has the ability to switch polarities with the mouse buttons! Opposites attract and likes repel! 

Magnets will still pull you if your jet is neutral.

Controls:

A - Steer Left

D - Steer Right

Left Click - Red Polarity

Right Click - Cyan Polarity

Escape - Pause Menu
